description: Build-fix patch: resolves MSVC compile errors in render.cpp by exposing a safe public identification query for the Discoveries UI (avoids private Game::isIdentified access), and removes MSVC unused-variable warnings by scoping details-column rendering to a clip rect.
summary: Fixes MSVC C2248 (private isIdentified) + C4189 (unused detailsW) and adds safe details-column clipping.
